name: Barbarian
description: A relentless combatant, fueled by fury or it's totem bonds with animals. In tune with the natural order.

name: Bard
description: A story teller or musician using his wits, magic, and lore to get out of (or avoid) tight situations.

name: Cleric
description: A Holy man or woman devoted to a deity. Capable of bolstering the party and heal their wounds, or laying low their enemies with divine wrath.

name: Druid
description: A nomad devoted to the world and the powers of Nature. Capable of adopting the form of a beast for battle or utility. Capable of bolstering the party and heal their wounds, or laying low their enemies with nature's wrath.

name: Fighter
description: Skilled combatant or strategist typically relying on his or her heavy armor and weapons to cut down their enemies. His training gives him unique abilities.

name: Monk
description: A martial artist pulling on the power of his or her own body to produce impressive results

name: Paladin
description: Nearly as skilled as the Fighter but bolsters their efforts with divine magic. through his devotion he gains special boons from their god.

name: Ranger
description: One who uses a unique blend of wilderness knowledge and martial ability to be a deadly hunter, with a bow, a pet or melee weapons.

name: Rogue
description: A thief, assassin or stealthy character who has a knack for picking out their enemies weaknesses and exploiting them.

name: Sorcerer
description: A magic user who draws their power from within, summoning their innate magical power and bending it to their will.

name: Warlock
description: Bound to a powerful entity through a pact, the warlock trades favors for boons and spells.

name: Wizard
description: A keeper of arcane secrets and forgotten knowledge, the wizard manipulates magic and spells with cunning.
